Text:
STOP posting PDF's!!!

Post JPG's Like everybody else.

Update:

I've just seen other of your torrents in the pictures division of this section and you DO post pictures.

There is no reason whatsoever to post pictures as anything other than JPG's  or PNG's. Your transforming them into PDF's is a waste of everybody's time.

From now on, kindly post JPG's and post them in the pictures division.
Thanx chusca for all you do ...as far as the .pdf  files...get a fucking converter you lazy bastards.
